description: Attend Bid Meetings with Engineering Team, Clarifications at Mega World Head Office, Samsung Office and other Government Centers.
Monitor of all the Concrete & Rebars requirements of the Project.
Coordinate with Arcadis & Mace & Commercial Team of the Purchase Requisition of all the assigned Owner Supply Materials of the Project.
Email requests and confirmation of updated reconciled Guaranteed Maximum Quantity (GMQ) of QS team (Arcadis) & Contractors.
Notify Contractors of the exceeded Materials Ordered in their submitted Initial or Reconciled GMQ.
Email Contractor, Project Management Team & Suppliers to resolve issues on Site.
Set meeting with Suppliers, Arcadis, Mace team & Contractors with Procurement Team to resolve big issues happened in Construction to avoid delays and issues to arise.
Procurement Strategy: Including but not limited to sending email requests to Suppliers of Materials needed in the Project and set meeting to discuss for their Best & Final Offer.
Set trial mix schedule with Suppliers & inform QAQC team of the next testing schedule to witness the materials strength if it has a passing rate in line with its curing age.
Attend Suppliers BAFO meeting with Department Head (Director) & Vice President of the Company.
Attend meeting with other Departments and top management to discuss schedules and deliveries of materials and etc.
Sourcing of Hotels Maintenance Materials in Plumbing & etc.
